deleteContinent() - Method in class com.riskgame.controller.CreateMapController
This method aims to delete a continent.
deleteCountry() - Method in class com.riskgame.controller.CreateMapController
This method aims to delete a country.
Dice - Class in com.riskgame.model
This class aims to model the dice of the players in the game
Dice() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.model.Dice
The default constructor
DiceController - Class in com.riskgame.controller
This class aims to assign dice to the player based on the armies and then if the attacker wins it lets him move the armies to the defender's countries.
DiceController() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.controller.DiceController
This is a default constructor

dominationPercentage(GameMapGraph) - Method in class com.riskgame.model.PlayerDomination
This method computes the domination view and returns the same to be displayed for each player
